pages.text: Bows and crossbows are no longer the only ranged weapon. Muskets and pistols are powerful ranged weapons that are a bit more costly to make and use. Additionally, they are very limited in enchantments. Learn more on the next pages.
The musket is a very powerful two-handed ranged weapon. It must be used from the main hand. At a smithing table, an iron sword can be affixed to it as a bayonet and can accept any sword enchantments.

The pistol is weaker than the musket. However, it is a one-handed weapon, so it can be used from the offhand, or even dual wielded. When dual wielding, watch out for the lengthy reload of loading two pistols at once!
The paper cartridge is the ammunition for flintlock weapons. It is compatible with both the musket and the pistol.
